## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/cluster/leiden/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name                  | type   | description                                                                                          |
|:----------------------|:-------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| --input               | file   | Input file.                                                                                          |
| --modality            | string |                                                                                                      |
| --obsp_connectivities | string | In which .obsp slot the neighbor connectivities can be found.                                        |
| --output              | file   | Output file.                                                                                         |
| --obs_name            | string | Name of the .obs key under which to add the cluster labels.                                          |
| --resolution          | double | A parameter value controlling the coarseness of the clustering. Higher values lead to more clusters. |
